member.name: NAMED_PROFILE_INFO
member.summary: The NAMED_PROFILE_INFO structure is used to store information about a named color profile.

member.name: NAMED_PROFILE_INFO.dwFlags
member.summary: Not currently used by the default CMM.

member.name: NAMED_PROFILE_INFO.dwCount
member.summary: Total number of named colors in the profile.

member.name: NAMED_PROFILE_INFO.dwCountDevCoordinates
member.summary: Total number of device coordinates for each named color.

member.name: NAMED_PROFILE_INFO.szPrefix
member.summary: Pointer to a string containing the prefix for each color name.

member.name: NAMED_PROFILE_INFO.szSuffix
member.summary: Pointer to a string containing the suffix for each color name.
